title: Game Of Thrones Earns 19 Emmy Nominations
teaser: Emmy nominations were announced early this morning. NPR TV critic Eric Deggans joins us with details.
contentencoded:
Emmy nominations were announced early this morning. “Game of Thrones” and “Breaking Bad” received 19 and 16 Emmy nominations, respectively. NPR TV critic Eric Deggans discusses the nominations with Here & Now’s Robin Young.

  • See all of the Emmy nominations

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, TV critic for NPR. He tweetsÂ @Deggans.
